revisionDesc.change: Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - "=Laudenbach from original" => "=PN B.Laudenbach from original". The reading is clear.
Submit - I corrected ὑπάρχητε in ὑπάρχηιτε as it appears on the papyrus (l.18-19), and added a paragraphos. Neither was mentionned by the previous editors.
Commit - I corrected ὑπάρχητε in ὑπάρχηιτε as it appears on the papyrus, and added a paragraphos

Submit - l.16 I deleted (¨) on Θηβαίδος. I don't know where this information comes from and I think it's just a misunderstanding of the published text by Collart (Chrest.Wilck. 12 doesn't show it). I checked on the papyrus itself and on the picture and there's no trace of diaeresis. There's a manufacturing defect on the papyrus, but no missing fibre which could have disappeared.

Commit - l.16 I deleted (¨) on Θηβαίδος. I don't know where this information comes from and I think it's just a misunderstanding of the edited text. I checked on the papyrus itself and on the picture and there's no trace of diaeresis. There's a manufacturing defect on the papyrus, but no missing fibre.

Commit - l.16 I deleted (¨) on Θηβαίδος. I don't know where this information comes from and I think it's just a misunderstanding of the edited text. I checked on the papyrus itself and on the picture and there's no trace of diaeresis. There's a manufacturing defect on the papyrus, but no missing fibre.
changed schema; added xml:space=preserve; indented; moved title/@n to idno
Converted from TEI P4 (EpiDoc DTD v. 6) to P5 (EpiDoc RNG schema)

body.head: Sel. Pap. II 418 = C.Pap. Hengstl 16 = P.Bour. 12 = W.Chr. 12

div.head: r
div.ab:
Πλάτων τοῖς ἐν Παθύρει
ἱερεῦσι καὶ τοῖς ἄλλοις
τοῖς κατοικοῦσι
χαίρειν. γέγραφεν
ἡμῖν Φιλόξενος
ὁ ἀδελφὸς διʼ ὧν κεκό
μικεν ἡμῖν Ὄρσης
γραμμάτων περὶ τοῦ
τὸν μέγιστον Θεὸν
Σωτῆρα βασιλέα
ἐπιβεβληκέναι
εἰς Μέμφιν, Ἱέρακα δὲ
προκεχειρίσθαι
μετὰ δυνάμεων
μυρίων ἐπὶ κατα
στολὴν τῆς Θηβαίδος.
ὅπως οὖν εἰδότες
εὐθαρσεῖς ὑπάρ
χητεὑπάρ
χηιτεὑπάρ
χητε ἐκρίναμεν
σημῆναι.
ἔρρωσθε ἔτους λ Φαῶφι ιθ

div.head: v
div.ab:
τοῖς ἐν Παθύρει
ἰερεῦσι καὶ τοῖς ἄλλοις.
